jobDescription: Donnelley Financial Solutions (NYSE: DFIN) provides software and services that enable clients to communicate with confidence in a complex regulatory environment. With 3,500 employees in 61 locations across 18 countries, we provide thousands of clients globally with innovative tools for content creation, management and distribution, as well as data analytics and multi-lingual translations services. Leveraging advanced technology, deep-domain expertise and 24/7 support, we deliver cost-effective solutions to meet the evolving needs of our clients. Company Info  Donnelley Financial Solutions (DFS) is a leading financial communications services company with approximately 3,500 employees and 2015 revenues of $1.1 billion. DFS serves capital market and investment market clients by delivering products and services to help create, manage and deliver accurate and timely financial communications to investors and regulators.  Position Summary  The Data Analyst will report to the Chief Data Architect and will be responsible for gathering and analyzing data from disparate systems and producing insights to solve business problems.
